arca.util package

Submodules

arca.util.math module

log2_floor(x: int) → int

Returns the equivalent of \(\lfloor \log_2 (x) \rfloor\). This is a slight optimization over math.floor(math.log2(x)).

Parameters

x¶ – the number to compute the log2 floor of

Returns

\(\lfloor \log_2 (x) \rfloor\)

log2_ceil(x: int) → int

Returns the equivalent of \(\lceil \log_2 (x) \rceil\). This is a slight optimization over math.ceil(math.log2(x)).

Parameters

x¶ – the number to compute the log2 ceiling of

Returns

\(\lceil \log_2 (x) \rceil\)
